programme.desc: A brand-new NASA mission to the sun reveals cutting-edge discoveries about Earth's star; as the Parker Solar Probe dives through the sun's atmosphere, its findings challenge everything known about this strange place.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: An explosion in the discovery of exoplanets is challenging everything we know about our universe; experts use cutting-edge astronomy to investigate these mysterious alien worlds and how they defy the laws of physics.

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored

programme.title: Movie

programme.desc: Capt. Cragen is implicated in an internal police scandal, and Stone reluctantly prosecutes him on bribery and corruption charges.

programme.desc: Detective Phil Cerreta transfers to the precinct and takes charge of the investigation into the murder of Detective Greevey.

programme.desc: Stone must combat the emotional testimony of an estranged wife on trial for the murder of her husband and his lover.

programme.desc: A convicted murderer argues to be set free because detectives unlawfully searched his home, a cardboard box.

programme.desc: A couple who refused treatment on religious grounds for their gravely ill child are charged with murder later.

programme.desc: An apparent attack on a pregnant woman who then miscarried is part of a blackmail scheme against her boss.

programme.desc: An ex-football star's murder over gambling debts is in doubt because of a double-indemnity policy on him.

programme.desc: The corpse of a sleazy producer found in a meat locker leads to an investigation of a his co-producer.

programme.desc: A celebrity's obsessive fan claims insanity as a defense tactic, so Stone sets out to prove the stalker is mentally competent.

programme.desc: Stone's fervor to defeat an old adversary (George Grizzard) jeopardizes his case against the murderer of an FBI witness.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney sees Andy and Helen sneaking a kiss in the jewelry store and tells everyone they are engaged. Aunt Bee redecorates Andy's room to make it more appropriate for a bride and throws a surprise party for them.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Thelma Lou uses Gomer and flirts with him to make Barney jealous after he says that he has her in his hip pocket. Things escalate when she slips and kisses Gomer on the cheek.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy, Barney, and Gomer take Opie and a couple of his friends on a camping trip. When Opie leaves early in the morning to pick berries, Barney and Gomer go looking for him but end up getting lost in the woods.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Gomer enlists and joins the Marines to test himself as a man, with Andy driving him to the base for his first day at boot camp. When Andy learns that the sergeant plans to get Gomer home, he tries to prevent Gomer from getting kicked out.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie has a crush on his teacher, who is also Andy's girlfriend.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and Aunt Bee help Barney reach the new civil service height and weight requirements so that he can keep his job.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy's patience is tried when the Taylors are visited by relatives.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.sub-title: The Education of Ernest T. Bass

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee's former beau, Roger Hanover, pays her a visit and begins courting her again. Andy and Opie soon become annoyed at Roger's bad jokes and gags.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney tries to train Blue, a bloodhound, to track criminals. His plan backfires when he leads Blue to a criminal and the dog starts obeying him instead of Barney.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney and Thelma Lou have an argument. When Andy tries to console Barney, it leads to a parade of other arguments among Andy, Barney, Thelma Lou and Helen.
